short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically sets YouTube video playback speed to 2x

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of manually adjusting the speed every time you watch a YouTube video? 2xFun automatically sets the playback speed to 2x by default for every video you watch, saving you time and enhancing your viewing experience.

Simply install the 2xFun extension, and all YouTube videos will start playing at 2x speed by default, every time you hit play. No need to manually adjust the settings for each video â€“ just sit back, relax, and watch at twice the speed.

Boost your productivity and enjoy faster YouTube content with 2xFun today!
